channel.title: Projects on Alejandro Coria Games
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Alejandro Coria Games

item.title: Map​Frontiers
item.author: contact@alejandrocoria.games (Alejandro Coria)
item.description: This mod is an addon for Journey Map that allows you to divide the map into regions and assign them names, colors and a banner.

item.title: Journey​Map
item.author: contact@alejandrocoria.games (Alejandro Coria)
item.description: I provide additional programming to JourneyMap, the popular Minecraft mod.

item.title: Image​Titles
item.author: contact@alejandrocoria.games (Alejandro Coria)
item.description: Replace Minecraft titles with custom images. Create a resource pack with the images and you’ll be able to display them to all players on your server. Go to ImageTitles Example for instructions on how to create a resource pack. Vanilla: ImageTitles:

item.title: Spelunker's Torch
item.author: contact@alejandrocoria.games (Alejandro Coria)
item.description: Go into a cave using these torches and you will always know where the exit is. These torches will illuminate the same as a regular one but will also point to the previously placed torch, that way when exploring a cave you will always know how to return to the entrance.

item.title: Auto​Preset​Map
item.author: contact@alejandrocoria.games (Alejandro Coria)
item.description: This mod is an addon for Journey Map that changes the minimap preset when you change dimension. It is for the client (Forge or Fabric), it is not needed on the server. To configure it, use the button to the right on the JourneyMap fullscreen map.

item.title: P-Changer
item.author: contact@alejandrocoria.games (Alejandro Coria)
item.description: You need to activate adobe flash player to play this game.
